name: God Slayer
overview: God Slayer is a sideways scrolling shooter for 1 player developed by Jeffrey Oulette using the Shoot 'Em Up Construction Kit. It was released in 2010 as part of the 2010 Sideways SEUCK Compo. You are an executioner of the evil gods. It is your task as governed by the Alfather to seek out and destroy the evil revilous gods. For this mission, you must destroy 3 of the elder dieties who have allied against the forces of stability. First is Beezlebub who guards the entrance to the pit. The other two evil gods are Yagril and Hathor. You must then meet Valfather, who is the mistress of the underground. Defeat her and retrieve the magic singing sword to bring back stability to you world.
